search.query: select * from tbl_users where {email_id in ($[pEmailId])} and { user_id in($[pUserId]) } limit 1

select q.question_id as questionID, q.question as question , o.option_value as answer, q.created_by as createdBy, q.updated_by as updatedBy, q.created_on as createdOn, q.updated_on as updatedOn from tbl_questions q inner join tbl_que_options o on o.question_id = q.question_id where o.isCorrect = 1 and { q.created_by in ($[pList]) } and { q.updated_on in ($[pUpdatedOn]) }

select que.question_id, que.question from tbl_questions que inner join tbl_questions_group qg on que.question_id = qg.question_id inner join tbl_groups_test gt on gt.group_id = qg.group_id WHERE { gt.test_id in ($[pTestID]) }
